product_name: Pearl Izumi Fly In-R-Cool Sport Bike Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Fly In-R-Cool Sport Bike Tank Top provides athletic support in a streamlined fit with innovative In-R-Cool(R) fabric technology that cools the body while you exercise. P.R.O. Transfer fabric with In-R-Cool cools your skin when you sweat: skin-side fibers pull moisture to fabric surface; outside of fabric spreads moisture for fast evaporation. Laser-cut Direct-Vent panels dry fast and provide optimal temperature regulation. Inner bra with plush elastic provides good support. Fly In-R-Cool Sport Bike Tank Top offers 1 back easy-access envelope pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Fly In-R-Cool Sport Bike Tank Top provides athletic support in a streamlined fit with innovative In-R-Cool(R) fabric technology that cools the body while you exercise.
